title: Fintech sector will dominate future Unicorns at USD 58 billion: Hurun report
description: The total worth of India's future unicorns will stand at USD 58 billion, an increase of 1.2 per cent as compared to last year. Fintech sector leads with the highest number of companies that can become Unicorns in future.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
